metadata.title: USN-6611-1 -- Exim vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Exim incorrectly handled certain requests. A remote attacker could possibly use a published exploitation technique to inject e-mail messages with a spoofed MAIL FROM address, allowing bypass of an SPF protection mechanism.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6611-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  exim4-dev - 4.95-4ubuntu2.5 eximon4 - 4.95-4ubuntu2.5 exim4 - 4.95-4ubuntu2.5 exim4-daemon-light - 4.95-4ubuntu2.5 exim4-config - 4.95-4ubuntu2.5 exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.95-4ubuntu2.5 exim4-base - 4.95-4ubuntu2.5 No subscription required
